description.text: You have trained to fight while submerged in water.

sections.Benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on Swim checks and don't take the usual penalties on melee attack rolls made underwater. Your slashing melee attacks and unarmed bludgeoning attacks deal full damage underwater.
